Applications


Buckeye features custom-made brushes to meet your exact applications. Our team will work closely with your staff to arrive at solutions to your needs. The size of our company allows us to focus on your requirements while maintaining the highest quality product at the most cost-effective price. We can meet or exceed your application requirements.



Motor applications include:

  • Various Fractional HP
  • Starters
  • Automotive
  • Vacuum/Blowers
  • Servo
  • Aerospace
  • Appliances
  • Low Voltage DC
  • Contacts
  • Computer Peripherals
  • Power Tools
  • High Speed
  • Lawn and Garden
  • Pumps
  • Generators
  • And much more!
